text: Caleb Olaniyan is a Nigerian Professor of Zoology, and former President of the Nigerian Academy of Science. In 1989, he was elected President of the Nigerian Academy of Science to succeeded Professor Ifedayo Oladapo. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Nigerian academics Category:Nigerian zoologists Category:Nigerian biologists Category:Fellows of the Nigerian Academy of Science Category:Nigerian Academy of Science Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Caleb Olaniyan
